answers.answer: I don't take any meds for diabetes or anything either thanks
umm what is the BG (Blood Sugar) when your  "to high" and  "to low"?
when I eat they rise to about 22 and when I don't they can go as low as 2.9 I feel  the symptom's too thanks

you probably have reactive hypoglycemiayou eat your BG way high because your pancreas is slow to react,  your BG goes down but your pancreas still pumps out insulin (its slow to react).some people help control it by eating LCHF (Low Carb High Fat).  by eating low carb your pancreas doesnt need to make much insulin so it doesnt over shoot as much and cause the lows.BG of 22 puts you firmly in house of Diabetes.  Welcome to the club
awe thank you soo much for taking the time to help
